sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useAuth } from '../context/authContext' export default function NavBar() { const { isAuthenticated, logout, user } = useAuth() const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState(); const logoutFunction = () => { logout() } console.log(user) // function para actualizar la pagina function actualizar() { window.location.reload(); } return (
Tasks Manager {isAuthenticated ? ( <>
  • Welcome {user.nombre}
  • Add Task
  • Tasks
    {user.id}
) : ( <>
  • Login (current)
  • register
)}
) }
